actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits the United States and any state from denying or abridging: (1) equality of rights under the law on account of sex; and (2) reproductive rights for women.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.
